title: (x) LoveSlap! Recordings logo fat face - Poster Bodoni {Lex}
content:
Hi-de-ho there:

If your into house music then you might have come across this one.

Thanks for helping,

Mike Diaz

author: SuperUltraFabulous

comments.content:
